metadata.title: CVE-2022-22934 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in SaltStack Salt in versions before 3002.8,3003.4, 3004.1. Salt Masters do not sign pillar data with the minionâ€™spublic key, which can result in attackers substituting arbitrary pillardata.

criterions.comment: salt package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
